item.title: OSINT & Social Engineering
item.author: Author
item.description: This week, I gave an introductory talk on open-source intelligence (OSINT) and social engineering. We also delved into the theories of why social engineering can be a successful attack and why humans are vulnerable to it! Resources Presentation Slides OSINT Open-Source Intelligence is the art of finding information from publicly available sources. This is crucial in pen testing (as the more you know about the company you are hacking â€“ the easier it can become).
